help: Modality of SMF. Can either be conversion or direct.
Path to directory containing input POD5 files (If doing Nanopore SMF)
Path to directory containing input BAM file (if doing SMF from an already basecalled experiment). Can also be a path to a FASTQ for conversion SMF.
Directory to act as root for all analysis outputs
An experiment name for the final h5ad file
The dorado basecalling model to use
The barcoding kit used for the experiment
Minimum proportion of reads mapping to a reference to further use that reference (Ranges from 0-1 as a proportion of mapped reads)
Minimum probability to call a canonical base identity
Minimum probability to flag m6A as True
Minimum probability to flag m5C as True
Minimum probability to flag hm5C as True
number of samples to analyze at a time
Types of modification types to use in conversion SMF
